name: pixu-talks-libraries
description: A monorepo for my talks, including common slides snippets and styles
author: Emiliano Pisu <pisuemiliano.1980@gmail.com>

scripts.deps:push: git add . && git commit -m 'build(deps): bumped external dependencies' && git push
scripts.changelog: changelog -t $(git log --grep='rel(' --format='%H' --max-count=2 | head -n 2 | tail -1)..$(git log --grep='rel(' --format='%H' --max-count=2 | head -n 1) -x rel,build && git add . && git commit --amend --no-edit
scripts.rel:push: git add . && git commit --amend --no-edit && git push -f && git push --tags
scripts.rel:patch: lerna publish patch && pnpm version patch --no-git-tag-version && pnpm run changelog && pnpm run rel:push
scripts.rel:minor: lerna publish minor && pnpm version minor --no-git-tag-version && pnpm run changelog && pnpm run rel:push
scripts.rel:major: lerna publish major && pnpm version major --no-git-tag-version && pnpm run changelog && pnpm run rel:push
